document_data.name: Bentan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Bentan''' was a devoted evangelist of [[Ilmater]] who traveled the [[Sword Coast]] sharing the dogma of the Crying God during the midâˆ’14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''I am giddy with joy, I think I will have to administer some self-flagellation just to calm myself down.''}}
document_data.Personality:
Like others of his faith, Bentan believed it was his duty to take on the suffering of others and endure them himself.

He believed that those who gave themselves to greed or lust were [[evil]] people, as were [[sorcerer]]s and other practitioners of [[arcane magic]].
document_data.Activities: The old man traveled the countryside attempted to convert others to the [[Church of Ilmater|Ilmatari faith]]. He told people to cast away their wicked ways and material possessions in order to fully devote their lives to Ilmater's cause.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Bentan was seen traveling in the area around the [[Firewine Bridge]].
